publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3584.1.1 Alison McInnes: National Planning Framework for Scotland 2 - Proposed Frameworkâ€”As an amendment to amendment (S3M-3584.1) in the name of David McLetchie, insert at end "and reaffirms that in accordance with paragraph 152 of the National Planning Framework for Scotland 2 proposed framework document it does not support the construction of new nuclear power stations in Scotland."
